title: Is Steve Jobs the greatest CEO of all time? Why or why not? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best CEO to have ever existed ? well it depends on what parameters you set to judge him as a CEO.  lets assume few parameters and see how he defined those parameters with his work - leadership - He was undoubtedly a charismatic leader .with his unique functioning style he did some of the most fascinating things in and outside apple.The very fact that he could revive apple from the face of bankruptcy to become one of the most successful company in the history of mankind is itself the testimony of the fact that he was a visionary and charismatic leader. strategy- he knew exactly what to do to take on the big giants like IBM in 80’s, Sony in 2000′s and Microsoft and google in the first decade of 21st century.apple under came up with ads and campaigns like “think different”  and “supper bowl commercial”-  these strategies didn't just work it changed the way people look towards the industry and apple as a whole. influence : Under him apple changed the way people uses personal computer,the way they listen music,the way people use phones and brought up tablet computing to masses .His contribution to different industry such as PC industry ,music industry(iPod and iTunes),animation movies and consumer electronics as a whole is unmatchable considering the era(70’s to 2010) he worked in where technology was not as good as it is now. we can take numbers of such parameters and talk about it and the list will go on and on. Steve jobs literally brought revolution to almost each and every industry he worked for. Now compare these with all the existing and past CEOs of different companies and check if anyone matches such credentials.

Probably I would put Satya Nadella above him for reasons below. In 2014, Microsoft market cap was around 300 Billion USD when he succeeded Steve Balmer. As of this morning, 1054 Billion USD leaving Amazon, Apple and Alphabet behind.Well numbers are magnificent but that’s not the reason I would put Mr. Nadella before Mr. Jobs. For the reason I put him above the legendary Steve Jobs or Bill Gates lies in reasons given below.Before Satya Nadella assumed office in 2014, we all know that Microsoft’s innovation was long gone because of culture dysfunction. Top talent were leaving and new talent was looking at Microsoft as an option to start or continue their career. Individuals were frustrated because their work was being rejected despite their work could have fixed major issues in the products and existing culture and vision was way away from Bill Gates’s and Paul Allen’s vision for the Microsoft.Mr Nadella took custody of the company made of more than 100,000 employees and not only fixed the culture, but made it the best culture in the industry.When N Korean hackers threatened to take down any digital company dare to host “The Interview” movie, Mr Nadella led Microsoft stood up the ground to defend the human rights of people like us.When Government came up with spooky schemes where our rights were at stack, Microsoft stood up the ground and fought in courts including Supreme Court to protect our rights and privacy.When there was a need of alliance to make transparency on how government’s use our data, he worked hand in hand with rival to protect of our own rights.When he did not convey a message appropriately, he did go out in public, apologized and made sure to convey the message concisely.His core is all about Empathy and we all know how hard it is to find a leader with great empathy. I think having a children with CP and Dyslexia would teach any parent on how to become the all time great (people’s) CEO…
